summary:
Growth Strategist | Growth Nest helps startups & scaleups master their growth systems from A to Z. More: growth-nest.com.

Why startups hire me:
✔ Marketing Strategy
Work with (marketing) teams to develop a marketing strategy from scratch.

✔ Lead Generation
Set up lead generation strategy based on the relevant acquisition channels.

✔ Team Structure
Structure marketing teams and set them ready for growth.

Why scaleups hire me:
✔ Marketing Strategy
Optimize current marketing & lead generation strategy to reach a desirable outcome.

✔ Data Management
Work with teams to build KPIs strategy to be on track with the set targets.

✔ Team Structure
(Re)Structure marketing teams and the way they work to be able to scale up. 

✔ Go International
Design powerful marketing strategies for companies going international. 

Feel free to get in touch with me via Linkedin or email at ani@growth-nest.com.

school.name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)

profile_positions.description:
Build self-sustaining growth systems for startups & scaleups by:
✔ Marketing Strategy
Work with (marketing) teams to develop a marketing strategy from scratch or optimize the current marketing strategy to reach a desirable outcome.

✔ Lead Generation
Set up a lead generation strategy based on the relevant acquisition channels or optimize the lead generation strategy to reach a desirable outcome.

✔ Team Structure
Optimize current marketing processes & strategies in teams. (Re)Structure marketing teams and set them ready for growth.

✔ Data Management
Work with teams to build KPIs strategy to be on track with the set targets.

✔ Go International
Design powerful marketing strategies for the European companies going to the US.
profile_positions.title: Growth Strategist

profile_positions.description:
✔ Build, manage and coach the Global Service Center Marketing department, lead the European team and be the functional team lead for the marketing colleagues in North America and Australia
✔ Align with overseas offices to create one vision on marketing
✔ Responsible for annual marketing plan, strategy & budget
✔ Responsible for all online and offline marketing activities of the team with a clear
focus on generating more leads
✔ Drive creation and development of marketing collateral and communication programs
✔ Work on strategic topics like the company’s marketing vision and strategy and write
policies and procedures accordingly
profile_positions.title: Global Marketing Lead

profile_positions.description:
✔ Responsible for all online/digital marketing activities
✔ Responsible for annual online marketing plan & budget
✔ Build & manage digital/growth marketing team
✔ Document all digital marketing activities
profile_positions.title: Growth Marketing Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for:

✔ Planning online lead generation campaigns and executing with the Growth team
✔ Planning annual online marketing campaign calendars
✔ Planning and keeping track of yearly online marketing KPIs
✔ Planning and executing marketing campaigns on LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram and YouTube
✔ Creating and analyzing the performance of paid ads (AdWords, Bing, YouTube, Instagram, etc.)
✔ Optimizing SEO (content, backlinking, link building, ALTs, Yoast, permalinks, guest blogging, keywords, etc.)
✔ Analyzing data and drawing conclusions (Google Analytics, Hotjar, Tag Manager, Amplitude, etc.)
✔ Coordinating Growth team (workload, structure, campaigns, etc.)
✔ Coordinating social media with Social Media and Content Marketing Assistant
✔ Performing usability tests and analyzing data
✔ Creating content for the websites
✔ Creating designs for the website based on the results from usability tests (UX/UI)
✔ Planning and executing growth hacking experimentations 
✔ Taking care of marketing automation in CRM
✔ Structuring CRM 
✔ Combining different data sources in CRM and analyzing data
✔ Taking care of other online marketing-related tasks

✔assisting staff with promoting events
✔assisting staff with tracking, formatting and archiving reviews and other media
✔maintaining and improving the relationships between partners of StudentsInc
✔evaluating the employees' happiness and satisfaction level
✔preparing marketing research on the potential target audience and competitors

volunteer_experiences.description:
Founder of the Charity Club of the Plekhanov Russian University of Economics.

✔ interaction with the orphanages and Children's homes in Moscow and suburbs 
✔ raising funds to meet the material needs of the orphanages and Children's homes
✔ organizing events to help children with social adaptation
✔ raising awareness of Children's homes and children who need help
✔ integration of students of the universities in Moscow into the charity activities

Supporting refugees with organising fun events, preparing and having dinner with them and collecting clothes.


"Nowadays there are some prejudiced opinions that can easily spread panic among us. We can be biased not to help those who actually do need our help. We are being always influenced by something or someone but eventually we are always able to decide ourselves who we are. 

You don't have to be rich to help people. You don't need to have anything special but your willingness and passion to do the things you want to do." - Ani, 21 years old, The Netherlands 

Join me and the rest of the supporters. For more information go to: http://bit.ly/1QcXnqF
